title: Sri Lanka donates 1000 kgs of tea for quake hit Haiti
content: Colombo, Jan 22 (PTI) Sri Lanka today announced to donate 1000 kilogrammes of tea for the victims of the earthquake in Haiti that hit the Caribbean nation on January 12. This donation is in addition to the financial pledge of USD 25,000 made by the Government soon after the news of the earthquake, an official…
